amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress concerning the appointment of a special counsel to conduct a fair, thorough, and independent investigation into a national security breach.

action.text: Amendment SA 1790 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1790.

Amendment SA 1790 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 1783. (consideration: CR S12160-12166; text: CR S12160) To express the sense of Congress concerning the appointment of a special counsel to conduct a fair, thorough, and independent investigation into a national security breach.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1790 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 1783.
